Mr. Bennet.name: Mr. Bennet
Mr. Bennet.role: father of the Bennet sisters, husband to Mrs. Bennet, involved in the search for Lydia

Mrs. Bennet.name: Mrs. Bennet
Mrs. Bennet.role: mother of the Bennet sisters, wife to Mr. Bennet, emotionally reactive to family events

Elizabeth Bennet.name: Elizabeth Bennet
Elizabeth Bennet.role: Elizabeth's sister, subject of concern regarding her feelings and relationship with Bingley

Jane Bennet.name: Jane Bennet
Jane Bennet.role: Eldest daughter of the Bennets, gentle and admired, also called Miss Bennet

Mary Bennet.name: Mary Bennet
Mary Bennet.role: Middle daughter of the Bennets, serious and studious, focused on accomplishments

Catherine Bennet.name: Catherine Bennet
Catherine Bennet.role: Fourth daughter of the Bennets, often called Kitty, interested in officers and balls

Lydia Bennet.name: Lydia Bennet
Lydia Bennet.role: Youngest daughter of the Bennets, lively and flirtatious, interested in officers

Mr. Bingley.name: Mr. Bingley
Mr. Bingley.role: Wealthy gentleman, friend of Mr. Darcy, resident of Netherfield, romantic interest of Jane Bennet

Miss Bingley.name: Miss Bingley
Miss Bingley.role: Sister of Mr. Bingley, proud and fashionable, later revealed as Caroline Bingley

Mrs. Hurst.name: Mrs. Hurst
Mrs. Hurst.role: Elder sister of Mr. Bingley, married to Mr. Hurst, fashionable and proud

Mr. Hurst.name: Mr. Hurst
Mr. Hurst.role: Brother-in-law of Mr. Bingley, husband of Mrs. Hurst, indolent and uninterested

Mr. Darcy.name: Mr. Darcy
Mr. Darcy.role: Wealthy gentleman from Derbyshire, owner of Pemberley, central figure in conflict with Mr. Wickham

Mrs. Long.name: Mrs. Long
Mrs. Long.role: Neighbor of the Bennets, considered selfish and hypocritical by Mrs. Bennet

Sir William Lucas.name: Sir William Lucas
Sir William Lucas.role: Father of Charlotte and Maria Lucas, neighbor to the Bennets, knighted gentleman

Lady Lucas.name: Lady Lucas
Lady Lucas.role: Wife of Sir William Lucas, neighbor and friend to Mrs. Bennet

Charlotte Lucas.name: Charlotte Lucas
Charlotte Lucas.role: Eldest daughter of the Lucases, sensible and Elizabeth’s intimate friend, also called Miss Lucas

Miss King.name: Miss King
Miss King.role: Young woman with a recent inheritance, current love interest of Mr. Wickham

Maria Lucas.name: Maria Lucas
Maria Lucas.role: Younger daughter of the Lucases, danced with Mr. Bingley

Mr. Robinson.name: Mr. Robinson
Mr. Robinson.role: Acquaintance at the Meryton assembly, conversed with Mr. Bingley about the local women

Young Lucas Boy.name: Young Lucas Boy
Young Lucas Boy.role: Unnamed young son of the Lucases, expresses desire to be as rich as Mr. Darcy

Mrs. Philips.name: Mrs. Philips
Mrs. Philips.role: Sister of Mrs. Bennet, aunt of the Bennet girls, married to Mr. Philips, lives in Meryton

Mr. Philips.name: Mr. Philips
Mr. Philips.role: Husband of Mrs. Philips, uncle by marriage to the Bennet girls, attorney in Meryton

Captain Carter.name: Captain Carter
Captain Carter.role: Officer in the militia regiment stationed in Meryton, admired by Lydia

Colonel Forster.name: Colonel Forster
Colonel Forster.role: commander of the militia regiment, host to Lydia in Brighton, involved in the search for her

Miss Watson.name: Miss Watson
Miss Watson.role: Acquaintance in Meryton, visited by officers like Captain Carter and Colonel Forster

Mr. Jones.name: Mr. Jones
Mr. Jones.role: Apothecary who attends to Jane Bennet when she falls ill at Netherfield

Mr. Collins.name: Mr. Collins
Mr. Collins.role: cousin to the Bennet sisters, clergyman, heir to Longbourn estate, writes a letter of condolence

Mr. Wickham.name: George Wickham
Mr. Wickham.role: character whose past and actions are detailed in Darcy's letter, subject of Elizabeth's reassessment

Lady Catherine de Bourgh.name: Lady Catherine de Bourgh
Lady Catherine de Bourgh.role: Wealthy noblewoman, patroness of Mr. Collins, aunt of Mr. Darcy, mother of Miss de Bourgh

Late Mr. Darcy.name: Late Mr. Darcy
Late Mr. Darcy.role: Father of the current Mr. Darcy, godfather and benefactor to Mr. Wickham

Mr. Denny.name: Mr. Denny
Mr. Denny.role: officer in the militia, acquaintance of Wickham, questioned about the elopement

Miss Darcy.name: Miss Darcy
Miss Darcy.role: Sister of Mr. Fitzwilliam Darcy, potential love interest of Mr. Bingley per speculation

Lady Anne Darcy.name: Lady Anne Darcy
Lady Anne Darcy.role: Mother of Mr. Darcy, sister of Lady Catherine de Bourgh

Miss de Bourgh.name: Miss de Bourgh
Miss de Bourgh.role: Daughter of Lady Catherine de Bourgh, sickly and reserved young woman

Old Wickham.name: Old Wickham
Old Wickham.role: Father of George Wickham, steward to the late Mr. Darcy

Mr. Gardiner.name: Mr. Gardiner
Mr. Gardiner.role: Elizabeth's uncle, brother to Mrs. Bennet, supportive family member assisting in the search for Lydia

Mrs. Gardiner.name: Mrs. Gardiner
Mrs. Gardiner.role: Wife of Mr. Gardiner, aunt to the Bennet sisters; an amiable and intelligent woman

Mrs. Jenkinson.name: Mrs. Jenkinson
Mrs. Jenkinson.role: Companion to Miss de Bourgh, living with the de Bourgh family

Sir Lewis de Bourgh.name: Sir Lewis de Bourgh
Sir Lewis de Bourgh.role: Late husband of Lady Catherine de Bourgh, former owner of Rosings

Lady Metcalfe.name: Lady Metcalfe
Lady Metcalfe.role: Acquaintance of Lady Catherine, mentioned in connection with a recommendation

Miss Pope.name: Miss Pope
Miss Pope.role: Young woman recommended by Lady Catherine for a position, praised by Lady Metcalfe

Colonel Fitzwilliam.name: Colonel Fitzwilliam
Colonel Fitzwilliam.role: cousin of Darcy, visitor at Rosings, source of corroborating information about Wickham

Georgiana Darcy.name: Georgiana Darcy
Georgiana Darcy.role: niece of Lady Catherine, sister of Mr. Darcy, mentioned in context of travel arrangements

Lady Anne.name: Lady Anne
Lady Anne.role: mother of Mr. Darcy, mentioned alongside Miss Darcy in context of propriety

Dawson.name: Dawson
Dawson.role: servant or coachman associated with Lady Catherine, mentioned in travel plans

John.name: John
John.role: servant suggested by Lady Catherine to accompany Elizabeth and Maria

Mrs. Forster.name: Mrs. Forster
Mrs. Forster.role: wife of Colonel Forster, responsible for Lydia during her stay in Brighton

Lady Catherine's Daughter.name: Lady Catherine's Daughter
Lady Catherine's Daughter.role: daughter of Lady Catherine, mentioned in relation to the family scandal

Mrs. Hill.name: Mrs. Hill
Mrs. Hill.role: housekeeper at Longbourn, trusted servant of the Bennet family

Pratt.name: Pratt
Pratt.role: individual mentioned in Lydia's letter as someone she had an engagement with

Sally.name: Sally
Sally.role: servant mentioned in Lydia's letter, tasked with mending a gown

Haggerston.name: Haggerston
Haggerston.role: individual mentioned by Mr. Gardiner as someone to prepare a settlement for Lydia's marriage
